Content.Text:
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, Ms. <MYNAME>. Welcome.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you have a little time to spare? I
have a request for you, actually.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Will you come with me a moment?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
As it turns out, we need some stone
pretty urgently. We've got the raw
stones but still no hammer.
<PAGE>
Do you think you could use your hammer
to turn them into workable stones?
No I could not
Sure I could

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Of course. Please forgive me for making
such a request.
<PAGE>
We'll find some way to make these rocks
manageable, fear not. I have matters to
attend to, so can you please leave now?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
My apologies for not being able to do
more for you, after you came all the way
here today.
<PAGE>
Please do come again another day. Thank
you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you so much. Can you get started
right away?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Excellent, Ms. <MYNAME>. You know your way
around a hammer. I will need to repay 
you one way or the other...

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ms. <MYNAME>, is anything the matter?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Ms. <MYNAME>, please show me your hands.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Show them to me, please!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Your nail is split! Could that be from
the hammer? We have to get you to the
hospital!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
You don't like hospitals? Whatever are
you talking about! Come on, we're going!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Whatever were you doing? Hitting your
own finger with a hammer is hardly
something I'd expect from a farmer.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Doctor, please do not talk to her like
that. It was my request that led to this
injury.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, okay, calm down. This is too
inconsequential an injury to become so
excited about, anyway.
<PAGE>
You can leave as soon as I finish the
treatment. The pain won't last long, but
come again soon if the pain persists.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you so much, doctor.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ms. <MYNAME>, shall we leave? I will walk
you back to your house.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Your hand must be hurting a great deal.
You have my sincerest apologies for your
injury.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you. You are very kind, Ms.
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Thank you for the stone. It will prove a
big help to us.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I will thank you for this another day.
<PAGE>
I must be getting back. Please take care
of yourself.
